grails-app.domain.org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.orm.auditable
Class AuditLogEvent

AuditLogEvents are reported to the AuditLog table this requires you to set up a table or allow Grails to create a table for you.

Method Summary
void readObject(def input)
           A very Groovy de-serializer that maps a stored map onto the object assuming that the keys match attribute properties.
String toString()
          
void writeObject(def out)
           Because Closures do not serialize we can't send the constraints closure to the Serialize API so we have to have a custom serializer to allow for this object to show up inside a webFlow context.
